channel.title: [718] SkylarScape Reborn 718/742 Private Server
channel.description:
SkylarScape 718
Original Source Base: Ben's Project
Webclient: [url=http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient]http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient[/url] Jar: [url=http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient/skylarscape.jar]http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient/skylarscape.jar[/url] Homepage: [url=http://skylarscape.com]http://skylarscape.com[/url]
Server Rates: - Combat: x50 - Skills: x55
Special Features/Information: Working Summoning Working Hunter 100% Skillcapes New Graphics Webclient Stable Economy Server Helpful User Information in Quest Tab Shops moved to Varrock making the game more Open world. FREE spins per a time limit as well as loyalty. Torva, Pernix, Virtus, Primal, Chaotics, 3rd age, Party Hats, Halloween Masks, & Scythe in SoF No Donator Only Items. Farming system Semi Construction System Working Nex + Portal to nex Stalls at home as requested by users Re-Organized SoF Dragon Invasions - Dragon attacks town throughout the day non stop, every 2-3 hours Updated our cache to 742, we also bought the domain skylarscape.com
Server Specifications: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 4 Gigs CPU: Intel(R) Pentium(R) D CPU 2.80GhZ Connection: FioS (Fiber Optics)
[URL=http://s987.photobucket.com/user/Cadillac028/media/SOF_zpsc6ae007d.jpg.html][IMG]http://i987.photobucket.com/albums/ae356/Cadillac028/SOF_zpsc6ae007d.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s987.photobucket.com/user/Cadillac028/media/Home_zps14f77e9a.jpg.html][IMG]http://i987.photobucket.com/albums/ae356/Cadillac028/Home_zps14f77e9a.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s987.photobucket.com/user/Cadillac028/media/allbosses_zps3db92bbf.jpg.html][IMG]http://i987.photobucket.com/albums/ae356/Cadillac028/allbosses_zps3db92bbf.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s987.photobucket.com/user/Cadillac028/media/allteles_zps27392b7b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i987.photobucket.com/albums/ae356/Cadillac028/allteles_zps27392b7b.jpg[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/f5blnd.jpg[/img]
Credits: Ben @ Ben's project for base. Thank you for releasing such a great source, and will do my best to work on it more to make it more fun for the users who play.

@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“Stealmojo, post:19, topic:471122”]As I see “Play Classic” on your homepage, but do you actually have a Classic server up?

I’ve missed classic, and can’t seem to find something worth while.[/quote]

No, only the 718 is up at the moment. I haven’t changed the home page yet.

item.title: [718] SkylarScape Reborn 718/742 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:17, topic:471122”][quote author=Doobage link=topic=588660.msg4323046#msg4323046 date=1372450166]

Assuming this dragon invasion content is original, I am actually really impressed with the originality. I hope you will soon phase out the teleports though, as it just makes the game way too easy :).

Teleports require 10 law runs per a teleport, so it forces people to make money or do RuneCrafting or get drops for law runes.

[quote]thats actually a really creative Idea. Good luck with it.
its really simple though you just add in a timer and add in npc after a specific time.

you should make it so when dragons come a barrier like the fight caves is put up once you enter you can get out but if you get out you can’t come back in.

would make it more fun. [/quote]

No barriers, players can go and kill it, they are in a multi zone so its like a boss where people need to work together to take it down, not something to be soloed. Also we plan on making it do Waves so after you kill it, 2 or 3 more come until eventually you get to the main Dragon and then you fight that and get a Great drop.

(which as stated earlier, Dragons will spawn at random times of the day non-stop in random cities.
[/quote]
Color me impressed, good change up compared to most teleports. Maybe update it so they require elemental runes based on their location in the world?[/quote]

I like the sound of that, would have to change the player spawning though cuz we gave everyone a small pack of law runes to get started so they can get use to the system, but I do like the sound of that and will look into it

Read full topic

Assuming this dragon invasion content is original, I am actually really impressed with the originality. I hope you will soon phase out the teleports though, as it just makes the game way too easy :).

you should make it so when dragons come a barrier like the fight caves is put up once you enter you can get out but if you get out you can’t come back in.

Also we plan on making it do Waves so after you kill it, 2 or 3 more come until eventually you get to the main Dragon and then you fight that and get a Great drop.

item.title: [718] SkylarScape Reborn 718/742 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Elrick:

Assuming this dragon invasion content is original, I am actually really impressed with the originality. I hope you will soon phase out the teleports though, as it just makes the game way too easy :).

Teleports require 10 law runs per a teleport, so it forces people to make money or do RuneCrafting or get drops for law runes.

thats actually a really creative Idea. Good luck with it. its really simple though you just add in a timer and add in npc after a specific time.

you should make it so when dragons come a barrier like the fight caves is put up once you enter you can get out but if you get out you can’t come back in.

would make it more fun.

No barriers, players can go and kill it, they are in a multi zone so its like a boss where people need to work together to take it down, not something to be soloed. Also we plan on making it do Waves so after you kill it, 2 or 3 more come until eventually you get to the main Dragon and then you fight that and get a Great drop.

(which as stated earlier, Dragons will spawn at random times of the day non-stop in random cities.

Read full topic

[Dragons will attack random towns at random hours in the day]

[/quote]I don’t see a dragon in that place what exactly happens?[/quote]
dragon invasion is still being tested. after every couple hours it lands in a random city and you run there and kill it, whoever kills it gets some rare loot apparently.

item.title: [718] SkylarScape Reborn 718/742 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[Update]

Changed to 718 - Reopened

Other Updates:

[Updates]

Fixed the hacking issues with dragonkk, apache & fagg
Cleaned & Organized Squeal of fortune to be more open to all rewards
Fixed Duel Arena & added anti-dupe system
Fixed Thieving stalls EXP
Removed Law rune requirements on ALL mini-game teleports
added stalls to home per request of community
removed spin tickets every 30 minutes, Users will just get the spins now instead of loosing the tickets when having a full inventory.
Farming added on server

Read full topic

item.title: [718] SkylarScape Reborn 718/742 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

SkylarScape 718

Original Source Base: Ben’s Project

Webclient: http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient
Jar: http://skylarscape.no-ip.org/webclient/skylarscape.jar
Homepage: http://skylarscape.com

Server Rates:

  • Combat: x50
  • Skills: x55

Special Features/Information:
Working Summoning
Working Hunter
100% Skillcapes
New Graphics
Webclient
Stable Economy Server
Helpful User Information in Quest Tab
Shops moved to Varrock making the game more Open world.
FREE spins per a time limit as well as loyalty.
Torva, Pernix, Virtus, Primal, Chaotics, 3rd age, Party Hats, Halloween Masks, & Scythe in SoF
No Donator Only Items.
Farming system
Semi Construction System
Working Nex + Portal to nex
Stalls at home as requested by users
Re-Organized SoF
Dragon Invasions - Dragon attacks town throughout the day non stop, every 2-3 hours
Updated our cache to 742, we also bought the domain skylarscape.com

Server Specifications:
OS: Windows Vista
Memory: 4 Gigs
CPU: Intel® Pentium® D CPU 2.80GhZ
Connection: FioS (Fiber Optics)

f5blnd.jpg798×740

Credits: Ben @ Ben’s project for base. Thank you for releasing such a great source, and will do my best to work on it more to make it more fun for the users who play.

Read full topic
